post:
# Halloween is coming and as you know we have been quite busy recently, and to celebrate all the hard work we are throwing a Halloween party.
# We have already changed into a new costume, you can check it out on [www.virtono.com](https://www.virtono.com "www.virtono.com") 

## We have built an all new infrastructure, with all new and performant servers in over 11 locations all around the world: 
## Europe: Paris, Amsterdam, Stockholm, Madrid, Manchester, Frankfurt, Bucharest
## USA: Los Angeles, Dallas, New York, Miami
## 
## Here is our special treat for LET: 

**KVM 1G **- ~~€4.95/mo~~ €3.45/month or ~~€59.40/year~~ €29.95/year
**Storage**: 30GB SSD 
**CPU**: 1 vCPU
**Memory**: 1GB RAM
**Bandwidth**: 2TB
1 IPv4 Address
/64 IPv6 Subnet
KVM Virtualization
1Gbps Connection
[**Order Now**](https://www.virtono.com/index.php?rp=/store/cloud-vps-1/kvm-1g "**Order Now**")

_All VPS plans are instantly set up! Latest os versions from CentOS, Fedora, Debian, Ubuntu and others are available. You can also upload your own iso and install OS via VNC._

----------

**Beside the LET Offer, we have prepared an offer that is available for all the services on our website during the Halloween Holiday (29 Oct - 1 Nov)**

![](https://virtono.com/promo/hallo3.jpg "")


**As you know there is no Halloween party without treats, so to make sure everyone is partying with us we are cutting everything in half!
That’s right a one-time 50% discount on all our services from our website using the promo code: HALLO50**


Our services are on par with the best in the business and we are just offering them top you at half the price.

After all it is a party, and we are the HOST, so everything is on us!

Just get your bags ready, visit [https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps](https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps "https://www.virtono.com/cloud-vps") and enjoy the party !
